Test.Name: Correct response. Notification is received at first attempt
Test.Description:
Annex A.12:
DynamicRecording is True Notification is received at first attempt

Test.Name: fault to CreateRecordingJob
Test.Description:
Annex A.6:
DynamicRecording is True Notification is received at first attempt Annex A.13: fault to CreateRecordingJob

Test.Name: Annex A.13: incorrect RecordingToken in CreateRecordingJob response
Test.Description: Annex A.6: GetServices is supported DynamicRecording is True Notification is received at first attempt Annex A.9: RecordingJob is created at first attempt RecordingToken in CreateRecordingJob response is not equals to RecordingToken from CreateRecordingJobRequest

Test.Name: Annex A.9: incorrect Mode in CreateRecordingJob response
Test.Description: Mode in CreateRecordingJob response is not equals to Mode from CreateRecordingJobRequest

Test.Name: Annex A.9: incorrect Priority in CreateRecordingJob response
Test.Description: Priority in CreateRecordingJob response is not equals to Priority from CreateRecordingJobRequest

Test.Name: Annex A.9: incorrect RecordingToken in CreateRecordingJob response
Test.Description: RecordingToken in CreateRecordingJob response is not equals to RecordingToken from CreateRecordingJobRequest

Test.Name: Annex A.9: incorrect SourceToken.Type in CreateRecordingJob response
Test.Description: SourceToken.Type in CreateRecordingJob response is not equal to Receiver

Test.Name: Annex A.9: AutoCreateReceiver is present in CreateRecordingJob response
Test.Description: AutoCreateReceiver is present in CreateRecordingJob response

Test.Name: A.7: The first notify message has not expected mode
Test.Description: Annex A.7: The first notify message has SimpleItem.State=Idle (all other parameters are as expected) The second notify message is true Check that the first notify is not acepted by TT

Test.Name: A.7: The notify message has not expected recording token
Test.Description: Annex A.7: The first notify message has not expected Recording token (all other parameters are as expected) Check that the first notify is not acepted by TT

Test.Name: A.7: The first notify message has not expected RecordingJob
Test.Description: Annex A.7: The first notify message has not expected RecordingJob (all other parameters are as expected) The second notify message is true Check that the first notify is not acepted by TT

Test.Name: Annex A.9: no SourceToken.Type in CreateRecordingJob response
Test.Description: SourceToken.Type is not presented (SourceToken.Type=Receiver by default)
